unnormalised: Arre bhai, they're saying it'll rain on 15/08 again? Last year too, Independence Day parade got washed out! Maybe next year we should prepone the celebrations to 14/08? Otherwise, mark my words, by 17:00 hrs, it'll be pakka waterlogged roads and chai-pakora weather! ğŸ˜œğŸŒ§ï¸
normalised: Arre bhai, they are saying it will rain on fifteenth august again? Last year too, Independence Day parade got washed out! Maybe next year we should prepone the celebrations to fourteenth august? Otherwise, mark my words, by seventeen hundred hours, it will be pakka waterlogged roads and chai-pakora weather!
